title: LEGALIGHT Mock Test 06 - CLAT 2026
description: Full-length CLAT mock test with 120 questions across 5 sections

passages.title: Growth vs Fixed Mindset Psychology
passages.content: Dr. Carol Dweck's research on mindset reveals fundamental differences between growth and fixed mindset individuals in their approach to challenges, effort, feedback, and success of others...

passages.title: Nature and Cognitive Performance - David Strayer Research
passages.content: University of Utah psychologist David Strayer's groundbreaking research demonstrates that spending time in nature dramatically improves cognitive performance and reduces mental fatigue...

passages.title: Urban Planning and Mental Health
passages.content: Contemporary urban planning research increasingly focuses on the psychological impacts of city design on resident wellbeing and mental health outcomes...

passages.title: Technology and Human Connection
passages.content: The paradox of digital connectivity - how increased technological connection may be creating unprecedented levels of human isolation and loneliness...

passages.title: Constitutional Law - Secularism and Socialism
passages.content: The Supreme Court's interpretation of secularism and socialism as basic features of the Constitution in landmark cases and their contemporary relevance...

passages.title: Contract Law - Digital Age Contracts
passages.content: Modern contract law challenges in the digital economy, including e-contracts, digital signatures, and online dispute resolution mechanisms...

passages.title: Criminal Law - Cyber Crimes
passages.content: Evolution of criminal law to address cybercrime, digital evidence, and jurisdiction issues in the internet age...

passages.title: Environmental Law - Climate Justice
passages.content: Emerging principles of climate justice and environmental protection in Indian jurisprudence and international law...

passages.title: Corporate Law - Start-up Regulations
passages.content: Legal framework for start-ups, venture capital, and emerging business models in India's evolving economy...

passages.title: Artificial Intelligence Ethics
passages.content: Ethical considerations in AI development, algorithmic bias, and the need for responsible AI governance frameworks...

passages.title: Social Media and Democracy
passages.content: The impact of social media platforms on democratic processes, information dissemination, and public opinion formation...

passages.title: Economic Policy Analysis
passages.content: Critical analysis of economic policies, their intended outcomes versus actual results, and policy evaluation frameworks...

passages.title: Educational System Reform
passages.content: Arguments for and against various educational reforms, skill-based learning vs traditional methods, and future of education...
